Other invited speakers include former Arkansas Governor Mike Huckabee , Indiana Governor Mitch Daniels , South Dakota Senator John Thune , former Alaska Governor Sarah Palin , Mississippi Governor Haley Barbour , and Indiana Representative Mike Pence . Iowans play a vital role in hosting the first-in-the-nation presidential caucus, and it is our privilege to offer this Presidential Lecture Series in order to provide our very influential base an opportunity to gain insight into our political process, said Bob Vander Plaats , president and CEO of The FAMiLY LEADER.`` Our base is serious about its role in the political process and the Presidential Lecture Series is a focused strategy to facilitate meaningful exposure to our constituents.

door on a 2012 presidential run, Indiana 6th District Mike Pence , a Republican, said he enjoys public service so much that he would rather run for an office he stands a stronger chance of winning. Our decision, honestly, did come down to the difference between opportunities to seek and opportunities to serve, he said Friday morning on his way in to a town hall meeting with about 50 constituents in this central Indiana town. Mike Pence Jerrold Nadler , D-N.Y. called the Chris Smith bill an attack on women, and said that it would go beyond the Hyde amendment by increasing taxes on people who have health insurance that covers abortions. This bill is a new and very extreme assault on the private choices families and businesses make on their own health care. We must not be deceived into believing that this bill would simply codified existing restrictions on the use of federal funding. This is pure falsehood, Jerrold Nadler said. The paper publishes a statement issued after the summit saying that the leaders have requested`` President Alassane Ouattara to nominate a candidate to head the West African bank''; and have invited the incumbent President, Laurent Gbagbo to respect the results of the election to pave the way for a smooth transfer of power in order to preserve peace, security and stability in this country and the region. Speaking in Bamako on the margins of the summit, Alassane Ouattara 's Prime Minister Guillaume Soro said:`` The military option will put an end to the chaos in Cote d'Ivoire,'' reports the paper.

Yard might have been hoping that the phone- hacking row would die down with the resignation of Andy Coulson . Few things seem more unlikely.
